As D.O. pumps in and out, his tanned body glistens with a fine sheen of sweat, and all Roman can do is take it like a man. The carnal negotiations rage on, fast and furious, until one after the other, the business partners seal the deal with spurts of manjuice.
title: Office Affairs, Scene #01
